meanings.definition: A flexible but inelastic cord of strong fibrous collagen tissue attaching a muscle to a bone.
meanings.sent1: The tendons connect the muscle to the bone.
meanings.sent2: She felt a pull in her tendons after running.
meanings.sent3: The tendons decided to take a break from all the heavy lifting.
meanings.sent4: His determination was like the tendons holding everything together.
meanings.sent5: The tendons stretched like rubber bands, allowing movement.

meanings.definition: A cord or band of inelastic tissue connecting a muscle with its bony attachment.
meanings.sent1: The tendons in his leg were sore after the workout.
meanings.sent2: The tendons in her wrist were strained from typing all day.
meanings.sent3: The tendons in the body were having a party, dancing to the beat.
meanings.sent4: The tendons were like bridges connecting muscle and bone.
meanings.sent5: The tendons held on tight, ensuring stability and movement.
